channel.title: CVE Feed for [Kiali] -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for [Kiali] -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-1762|2024-08-04T06:46:30.907Z -- %5Bkiali%5D -- kiali
item.description: An insufficient JWT validation vulnerability was found in Kiali versions 0.4.0 to 1.15.0 and was fixed in Kiali version 1.15.1, wherein a remote attacker could abuse this flaw by stealing a valid JWT cookie and using that to spoof a user session, possibly gaining privileges to view and alter the Istio configuration.
